noTasksMsg: No tasks assigned to the login user or no connectivity with BPS engine.
enableStatsMsg: Enable/Disable API usage tracker configurations used by the BAM data publisher and Google Analytics publisher in API gateway.
eventReceiverURLHelpMsg: Server URL of the Event Receiver used to collect statistics. An event can also be published to multiple Receiver Groups each having 1 or more receivers. Receivers are delimited by commas. ex: tcp://localhost:7612/,tcp://localhost:7613/
apiMgrGuide: WSO2 Practical Guide to API Management
useCase1: WSO2 Use Case: API Facade Pattern
